'''''Rickenella fibula''''' or '''''Omphalina fibula''''' is a species of [[fungus|fungi]] that belongs to the genus ''[[Rickenella]]''. The [[pileus (mycology)|cap]] is quite small, with a diameter usually less than {{convert|1|cm|1}}.<ref>Grand guide encyclopédique des champignons, Jean-Louis Lamaison</ref>
